galleryData.title: Java Bootcamp Graduation - Juara 3 Best Pitching
galleryData.description: Graduated from Java Fullstack Bootcamp by Komdigi x Metrodata Academy at Sahid Convention Hotels Sleman. Won 3rd Place Best Project Pitching and reached Top 5 nominations for Best Poster Design & Best Project Capstone. Presented the project solo.

galleryData.title: Lab Assistant - Web Design Interface
galleryData.description: Served as Lab Assistant for Web Design Interface course for working-class SI students. Created weekly slide materials and taught topics including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, and jQuery.

galleryData.title: Lab Assistant - Database Design & Programming with SQL
galleryData.description: Served as Lab Assistant for Database Design and Programming with SQL course. Created weekly slide materials and taught topics including SQL query management, database design, and using Oracle SQL database.

galleryData.title: BNSP Junior Network Administrator Certification
galleryData.description: Completed Junior Network Administrator training and certification by Komdigi & BNSP at FTI UMBY Lab. Designed network topology based on given case study as part of the Computer Networking course completion.

galleryData.title: HMPSSI Synergy Event
galleryData.description: Inter-university synergy event with HMPSSI UMBY, UNRIYO, and AMIKOM Information Systems student organizations. Shared experiences, knowledge, and built professional networks.

galleryData.title: PKKMB FTI UMBY 2024 - PDD Coordinator
galleryData.description: Served as PDD Coordinator for PKKMB FTI UMBY 2024. Documented ongoing events, coordinated video content production, and managed PKKMB FTI social media.

galleryData.title: ISCOMFEST 2024 - Media & Information Team
galleryData.description: Contributed to the success of Information System Competition Festival as a key member of the Media and Information team. Created engaging visual assets (posters, digital banners, video editing) and managed social media channels to boost participant engagement.
